wiki.content: "Blue" is the last single released from the alternative rock band A Perfect Circle's 2003 album Thirteenth Step. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Blue" is the last single released from the alternative rock band A Perfect Circle's 2003 album Thirteenth Step.

track.name: Blue
comments: That was dirty! LOL (And I CAN'T ignore the smoke!)
Can't un-hear "Holla Holla", by Ja Rule in the opening guitar line. Makes me giggle every time. Sorry if I ruined this riff for you. Misery loves company, what can I say.
these guys have such great talent...wonderful voices!
"Haven't listened to APC for way too long." -> Yeah, me too, I almost forgot how great they were over the last few years.
I'm blue da- oh wrong song lol
Fast becoming one of my favourite APS tunes now.
great song - need more APC/Tool/Puscifer/Ashes diVide - keep em coming boys!
One of the better tracks of Thirteenth Step.. Hoping for a new album soon.
